title: The Crypt Sessions: Lawrence Brownlee
desc: Tenor Lawrence Brownlee will take a break from the Metropolitan Opera stage, where he'll be singing Rossini's? La Donna del Lago , and share an intimate set?of spirituals and other songs - music he grew up with and loved long before he became one of the world's most in-demand bel canto tenors. Accompanying him on the piano will be longtime collaborator and Harlem resident?Damien Sneed, who arranged the songs for the concert (as well as their acclaimed recording? Spiritual Sketches).
